data.name: SearchFiles
data.description: Searches files in a given path using a regex pattern.
data.function: codebolt.fs.searchFiles(path: string, regex: string, filePattern: string)
data.input_variable_description: The path parameter specifies the search directory, regex contains the search pattern, and filePattern specifies the file types to search.
data.raw_content: Searches files in a given path using a regex pattern with file type filtering.
